channel.title: Need a question answered
channel.description: If I am hosting my rs server on a vps do i need to portforward my router that is connected to the computer? And if I do? Why do i have to? And if I don't how do I set it up on vps? Do I need to portforward it as well? And is linux vps alright for hosting it?

item.title: Need a question answered
item.dc:creator: @Fierystr Fierystr
item.description:
@Fierystr wrote:

Can you tell me why it will work?

Read full topic

item.title: Need a question answered
item.dc:creator: @_Haste1 #Haste
item.description:
@_Haste1 wrote:

[quote=“Fierystr, post:8, topic:393915”][quote author=#Haste link=topic=491100.msg3591142#msg3591142 date=1304644280]

ok one more question. what do i upload on my vps? the client and the source? only the source? the source folder or only one class?

The whole source file.
[/quote]

how do you upload a folder on uppit? it doesn’t let me select the whole folder… and what i don’t understand how will the client run on my computer if the source is in the vps? how will it find the source?[/quote]

/Facepalm

Right click the folder > Click Add to Archive > Compress it etc > And then try on uppit.com

And about the client; You need serious help bro…
ofc it will work /double facepalm

Read full topic

[/quote]

The whole source file.[/quote]

how do you upload a folder on uppit? it doesn’t let me select the whole folder… and what i don’t understand how will the client run on my computer if the source is in the vps? how will it find the source?

item.title: Need a question answered
item.dc:creator: @hadesflames hadesflames
item.description:
@hadesflames wrote:

If it’s on a vps, the ip should be static, so he doesn’t need the no-ip tool…

Read full topic

item.title: Need a question answered
item.dc:creator: @_Haste1 #Haste
item.description:
@_Haste1 wrote:

[quote=“Fierystr, post:3, topic:393915”][quote author=#Haste link=topic=491100.msg3591125#msg3591125 date=1304643655]

If I am hosting my rs server on a vps do i need to portforward my router that is connected to the computer? And if I do? Why do i have to? And if I don’t how do I set it up on vps? Do I need to portforward it as well? And is linux vps alright for hosting it?

No, you don’t have to porforward… And just upload your server onto uppit and then go onto your VPS and then go onto the link and download it. And then run it (if that don’t work, download the No-Ip tool thingy-ma-bob)
[/quote]

What is the no-ip tool thing?[/quote]

Go to the no-ip site, and find the downloadable no-ip desktop thing

Read full topic

item.title: Need a question answered
item.dc:creator: @Fierystr Fierystr

[/quote]

No, you don’t have to porforward… And just upload your server onto uppit and then go onto your VPS and then go onto the link and download it. And then run it (if that don’t work, download the No-Ip tool thingy-ma-bob)[/quote]

What is the no-ip tool thing?
